mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.college AS "college", a.name AS "name", a.logo AS "logo", a.url AS "url", a.lock_cnt AS "lockCnt", a.lesson_cnt AS "lessonCnt", a.livecourse_cnt AS "livecourseCnt", a.homework_cnt AS "homeworkCnt", a.kind AS "kind", a.status AS "status", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO major( id, college, name, logo, url, lock_cnt, lesson_cnt, livecourse_cnt, homework_cnt, kind, status, version, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{college}, #{name}, #{logo}, #{url}, #{lockCnt}, #{lessonCnt}, #{livecourseCnt}, #{homeworkCnt}, #{kind}, #{status}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE major SET college = #{college}, name = #{name}, logo = #{logo}, url = #{url}, lock_cnt = #{lockCnt}, lesson_cnt = #{lessonCnt}, livecourse_cnt = #{livecourseCnt}, homework_cnt = #{homeworkCnt}, kind = #{kind}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
